oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Asymptotic freedom of gluons in the Fock space
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Głazek, Stanisław D.
Gómez-Rocha, Maria
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High Energy Physics - Theory
High Energy Physics - Phenomenology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Asymptotic freedom of gluons is described in terms of a family of scale-dependent renormalized Hamiltonian operators acting in the Fock space. The Hamiltonians are obtained by applying the renormalization group procedure for effective particles to quantum Yang-Mills theory.
Comment: 18 pages, 2 figures, latex with Acta Phys. Pol. B cls
